lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons. We have an Ashley Johnson in transit from the airport, fresh from her vacation. She'll be here asap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder if she'll be nice and tanned.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (burps) Probably not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's too specific. Too specific, she might have gone to a place that wasn't a tannable place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's true. That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Too specific.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could have been tundra. Could have been tundra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true. Should be the tundra. Sounds like a great place to spend--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She could have gone skiing and just gotten a sunburn here, like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. That's true. Anyway, so Ashley will be joining us as soon as she arrives. Coming in hot! In the meantime, let's go ahead and cruise through our announcements. Let's see. Do we have any updates on merch at all, Laura?

lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you got?

lines.text: Okay. So we put our dice up for pre-order and they're already sold out in pre-order.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're struggling to keep up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some of these are still left, which are awesome, and they're so soft. And we have all the other t-shirts as well, except for the 'dagger, dagger, dagger' that Matt's wearing. Maybe we'll be getting those back in. I'm not sure. But all the other stuff. The nail wraps, and the vinyl stickers, and the hats.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whip crack)

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: He's a good little worker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty cool, too, because if you want to balance or find out and make sure the dice are perfectly balanced, you put it in the water but then you can't use the dice anymore because it just makes it soap.

lines.text: Yeah. But you smell fresh and clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true. So fresh and so clean. All righty. Taliesin, Wednesday Club coming up.

lines.text: Yeah, Jodie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jodie got announced. I think Max got announced for one. I haven't gone through the whole list, but we're going to start talking about the Eisners and it's probably-- we're going to break it up but I think we're probably going to have three talks about the Eisners. There's a lot to talk about. It'll be great.

lines.text: Yeah, like what are the Eisners?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are the Eisners? Who was Eisner? And--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And why Eisner?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are these books? What does it mean? We don't know. We'll find out.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. But we do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 'Cause they're awesome. So that's Wednesday Club on Wednesday at noon to 2PM.

lines.text: Once again, MomoCon's coming up very, very close, May 25th to the 28th. Taliesin, Marisha, myself, and Brian Foster will be there to talk about nerdy stuff. MomoCon? Two Street Fighter attacks in one intro. This is already a good Thursday, I'm excited.

lines.text: All right, so, let's get ready to dive in. I know today's been a harrowing day for a lot of people. It's gonna be okay. And don't forget what this feels like. That's all I have to say.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: So, last we left off, Vox Machina, having completed their venture over the past few arcs, having freed Whitestone from the tyranny of the Briarwoods, having brought down the Chroma Conclave, and essentially brought freedom back to Tal'Dorei, you closed up some loose ends, Keyleth finished her Aramente, and you all went to your business for a year-long time jump. You returned, and each of you recounted the things you wished to accomplish in that year, culminating in a Winter's Crest beachside vacation in the Bay of Gifts at the Port of Shamel, which involved some escalating pranks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Y'all have some fine cloth here!"

lines.text: "Right away, Lady." Rushes off quickly. As this is happening, Johann's in the process of eating a breakfast that primarily consists of just fine cakes. He has clusters of dried baked good around the outside of his mouth and caught in his mustache, he's freshly washed his hair, freshly combed over and slicked with whatever equivalent of pomade he carries with himself. And as you walk by, you see this-- like he has the plate and there's just a crumb-circle around it that has emerged, and is in the process of his gluttonous eating, he stops and goes, "Such delicacies are a "rare treat! You have to make time to enjoy the little things in life, don't you? At least when "the opportunity arises."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anyway. We were hoping to gather the clan and take you on a tour of the estate when you're prepared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pulls up his shirt and dabs at his mouth. It barely touches any of the actual food that's around his mouth area. He stops and goes, "Right, right, of course, of course. We'll just wait for "old Ogden to find his way down. He's a bit of a stickler when it comes to his time. So be patient, "sit down, let's have a meal! Why not get to know each other a little better, yes?"

lines.text: We do gotta wait for Uncle OG. By the way, since I'm the tour guide, do you have any plume-y hats? You know? 'Cause if you take like a campus tour, they have a flag and they're like, "Over here!" In case you get lost. Or like when tourists walk around and they're like, "Don't get left-- mm." Do you have anything like that?

lines.text: Let me check. I'll be right back.

lines.text: I'm stuffed. Let's go see how Ogden's doing. Astra!" "I'll be-- let me just finish this." "All right, we'll pick you up in a second. I'll go check in on Ogden." And he gets up and walks past, up the stairs. You are searching for what?

lines.text: Oh, well, I've gone into my sister's bedroom and have begun to raid the spring clothing to find the most ostentatious hat I can find and start shoving as many things into it as I possibly can.

But you do find what essentially amounts to a wide-brimmed captain's hat. It comes almost to a tri-corner point at the front and curves upward. It's mostly used for costuming purposes, it's reminiscent of masquerade balls, it's used for-- you actually recall, when she was younger, it was part of her masquerade ball wear. There was a mask with a long nose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To see if I can tie a bow? Okay. Oh, that's a saving throw. This is low, but that's a 12.

And they slowly make their way into the dining hall, sit down, and a simple meal of very, very soft oatmeal is presented for Uncle Ogden at their request before resting the night before, and JB gets her breakfast, and Johann is proud of the fact that he managed to acquire them, though it was not much of an ordeal on his end. Goes and joins Astra, and they seem to be eagerly awaiting the eventuality of this tour that they're all excited for. So you now can approach JB if you'd like.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be honest, I just kinda want to see the history. I wanna see how long it's been here, I "wanna see makes up the entirety of this crazy place. I haven't been inside a castle before, so "this is a new experience for me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Did you want to see just the castle, or did you want the grand deluxe Poobah tour, which is around Whitestone as well?

lines.text: "Right. I'm not one to judge. I mean, you've seen Ogden." And you glance over at Ogden, who's now in the process of trying to comb the oatmeal out of his beard while he's muttering below his breath. (incoherent muttering)

As he watches as Uncle Ogden lifts the, what by his size is rather large, cup of... beer-- that's the one, it's been a long week. Finishes it in three massive gulps, sets it down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, I couldn't do that.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Yeah, you fucked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that we can definitely find you no matter what.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You would think that, but honestly, I don't believe that we've ever had an official tour guide before you. You would be starting!

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TRAVIS

It pops up on the very, very tip. So it holds itself, but it only really covers the very, very top of your head.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: I know, I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be fine.

lines.text: My darling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Easy enough. All right. So. As you all leap onto the carpet except for Grog, Grog, you begin taking them around the grounds. You begin through the castle. Where do you want to begin?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh this foyer of Whitestone Castle was defended by myself and these fellows against the onslaught of dragons, giants, and hordes of undead. It has been in the de Rolo family for millennia.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: (laughs) All right. The carpet glides you guys to the outskirts of the castle. You begin taking them along the grounds, around the perimeter wall, and then through one of the underneath gates to the back garden, which you've recovered, and are now starting to actually grow again. You have like a small hedge maze back there, some rose gardens, and a small pond. You've filled in the exhaust holes that were used for the distillation of the whitestone and the acid pits that were installed by the Briarwoods. Now it is actually a garden once more. And so as this happens, you watch as Astra gets really excited at the edge of the carpet and is like, "Ooh my, look "at this place, it's like natural!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) 'It's like natural.'

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Don't know why I bother. Melanie is--

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- Melanie was actually fascinating. She was eventually removed from her position for accusations of witchcraft and raising of the undead. There's actually quite a bit of interesting ghost stories if that's your sort of--

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snores)

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.text: I'm not allowed to call them that anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take us there, boy!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a shooting alley. It's fun, it's got some moving bits, but I'm sure you can understand exactly what it entails.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both shake their head. "I have no idea what you're talking about, but let's go!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is quite possibly the only one in existence, so this is quite exciting.

lines.text: All right. As you guys make your way along the rest of the tour, the rest of you, who are not on this tour, what are you doing?

lines.text: We're gonna go find Willhand!

lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: Before I left, did I see Grog in his hat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it was amazing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, you look so distinguished!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You look so great in that hat! Where did you get this hat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Apparently this is the official tour hat of the house of Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the truth!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And apparently I'm the first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep, it was made hundreds of years ago, and was just sitting on the shelf waiting for the first official tour guide.

lines.text: Oh, Grog. This is just the perfect job for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: You know what? It's just supposed to be a little jaunty like that, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.text: So Vex, Pike, Keyleth, Taryon. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You make your way to the Sun Tree. It's about ten in the morning, time-wise, by the time you get going, and you see them kind of gliding around the outskirts of the castle, doing their slow traveling tour. As you approach the Sun Tree, where are you going? Heading to Westruun?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's go see him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know of a tree that's close by his house that we can just be right there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, in the backyard we have a pretty large tree.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen it before. You've been to the house, you've stayed there, so you know the tree she mentions, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys step through the portal created on the outskirts of the Sun Tree, you step through into-- I wouldn't say it's a yard, it's not a big yard, it's more of a small-- what would be used as a storage space behind this building, but you have the two-story red brick building that is your-- and, for a while, Grog's-- home of upbringing. Wilhand is not in the backyard, however, you do see that there is a lot of leftover building materials from the reconstruction of the second story, which sustained damage from the original assault of the Conclave. But looking up at the roof, which last you saw was amid disarray, looks like it's been reconstructed and completed, and the home is once again whole.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, this is nice to see. It's put together again. Well. Shall we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Find out about that curse.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (exhales) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You knock on the door. There's a slight pause. A little voice inside goes, "Eh? Who is it?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, Wilhand, it's Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In the yard?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just went around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The gate was open, the side gate.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The gate was open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dog run?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And the dog run. Just went around the dog run.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, the back door, the back door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another moment passes before the back door opens, which leads into the small kitchen. It's a humble home, but as it opens up, Wilhand is there, looking as liver-spotted and grinning as he was last you saw him. His balding top of his head and the crazed white mane of hair behind has gotten even longer and unkempt as he's now on his own and doesn't have anyone to really groom him. So he's going a little wild-gnome right now. You see his face light up immediately as soon as he sees your expression. "Oh, Pike! Pike, it's so good--"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, oh, oh, I'm sorry, I'm very strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I noticed. Well, friends."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to see you again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dex'avlia?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And that's Keyfen?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, come in, come in." He turns around and muscles his way inside. You've never quite been in a gnome home before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You grew up here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: For the most part. For the most part.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you seem okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughs) Yes. I'm okay. And Grog did a little bit as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's hard to believe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, he-- we made it work, you know? He slept outside a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was smaller then, too, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He, you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I loved sleeping outside, though. Did you guys have like a tree canopy thing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sometimes we would make forts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good living, Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds fun, sleeping outside when you have a perfectly good home to sleep in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, it's-- I'm an outdoorsy type.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: People have different preferences, and that's one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's very freeing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll have to try it sometime.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll try it sometime. I think you'll like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, you watch as Wilhand is rushing around the kitchen, frantically trying to make tea. He's like, "I wasn't expecting guests, my apologies! "Hold on!" He's like, one hand he's filling this tea kettle, and the other hand's trying to find some flint, and he's like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I light it up with my flame hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway. I'm so glad you could make it. It's so good to see you, Pike!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so good to see you. Sit and relax, I know where everything is, you don't have to-- I'll get tea ready for everybody. Just sit and relax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." And he sits down at the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As she gets up, can I just kind of whisper, 'cause he can't hear very well. Wilhand? Can you hear what I'm saying right now? Okay. Is it going to be all right, bringing this up around him?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sore subject? Maybe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not sure. Bring it up very, very lightly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll let you do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Okay. Wilhand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: First of all, I wanted to come see you 'cause it's been some time, and I'm so glad that the house has come along so nicely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It has. There's been some fantastic volunteers who've come by. They've rebuilt a lot "of the city."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's fantastic. Oh, I know what we were gonna ask you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but what did the man look like who came and grabbed the big robot?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) The guy that owned him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I just want to make sure it was him. Your big mustachioed metal man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yes. The broad stone one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Standard human fare. Taller than me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was he kind of a dick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kind of a what?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A penis!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as his head turns in a confused way. He goes, "Um." And he puts his finger in his ear and clears it out and goes, "I'm sorry, what?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like not a very nice person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yes, he was--"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Rude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- a bit... he was not the kindest or most forthcoming of guests, but he seemed to be a busy "man of much esteem and left before I could finish making his tea."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope he wasn't very mean to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, not mean at all, just extremely forceful." (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, we came-- well, first, I wanted you to meet Taryon, our new friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! What's your name?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon Darrington.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Taryon. Pleasure to meet you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it's a pleasure to make your a-cunt-ance. A-cunt-ance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans over and goes, "You're making interesting friends these days, Pike."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, okay, I'm just gonna--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sarenrae was very specific about making sure that you avoid the bad folk, and you're "currently dealing with what looks to be some ruffians using some naughty language."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is 'penis' a bad word?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just don't say that word again, Keyleth. I mean, it's not.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, I just feel like I like to be surrounded by all types, to sort of, you know, get to know--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Just messing with you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. I thought you got--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What, you think I didn't get drunk and say the off thing here and there? Back in my day, I "was a bit of a rabble-rouser, whether you believe it or not. Mm-hm."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was Johann and Ogden and JB.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hm."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They came to visit, 'cause I had sent them a little money and a letter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that's very kind of you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does this sound familiar to you at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be perfectly up-front, I kind of escaped the Trickfoot lifestyle when I was maybe about "your age. So I'm not as keen on all the familial history, but I can say that there's been more than "one curse thrown at our family name."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I haven't spoken with them in quite some time, or really anybody else. I decided "that you, there was something special about you, and it wasn't right to have you grow up in such an "uncouth environment, so I wanted to provide something different for you. I don't know if I "succeeded, but I did my best, and brought you into the light of the one that saved me. And look at "you now!" And he leans forward and grabs your holy symbol from the front and goes, "Why, you're the "brightest star she has."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna be terrible. Can I insight check him? I just want to see if it looks like he's hiding anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (high-pitched) I'm sorry, Wilhand.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's an old man. He doesn't lie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? He's hard to read in the sense that he's lived long enough and seen enough things in his time that he's open, but he keeps his history guarded, by nature. He seems genuine, but at the same time, you're not getting the whole picture, because he's not revealing the whole picture. He also spends a lot of time alone, too, so by nature he's a little hermited. So that's as much as you can make out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wilhand, how old were you when you left the Trickfoot family?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I would've been maybe in my early 40s."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. (whispers) How old are you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Early 40s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Did you know Theobold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And so do you know what happened to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In what way?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Ogden said he was affected by the curse, that he was killed by it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wasn't around for that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 24. No. Hang on, wait wait wait. I keep forgetting my insight went up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well. It seems to have worked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whispers. We have nothing to sell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes we do! We have these shirts that are still in the store.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Those shirts there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Been out for a week.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can even fold up the sleeves to make them super fashionable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're super cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And soft like the hoodie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Show 'em the dice on the back

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the house voice. When we go home, it's all that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really? That's how she talks at home? Oh, boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That's what we call the Bailey switch. Got home and it was like, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry. I just, I don't deal with them much these days. They wander, they-- I'm just an "old gnome trying to live his twilight years in peace and the joy of the Everlight."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So, I don't mean to press you on this, Wilhand, but did you know how he died? I mean, even if you weren't there, did you hear about it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know that he had passed and I heard it was around mysterious circumstances, but like many "Trickfoots before me and many after, they tend to die under mysterious circumstances. It's kind of "the life they lead."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wilhand, if you don't mind me asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There we are, yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know you mentioned to Pike before about a blood curse. Do you actually believe in the curse or do you believe that it's because of the life the Trickfoots lead? I know you've worked hard to get away from them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't want to live under the stigma. Sorry, I wish "I could be of more help."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm struggling a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What bothers you, child?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I feel like they're just, if anything, they're just odd. I'm odd and you're odd and that's just the way Trickfoots are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's the way family is. Those closest to you are usually the most odd."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's very true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There've been very upstanding people in our family in the past, and there've been some "downright scoundrels. We're as varied as any other folk in Exandria. It just so happens that some of "the scoundrels had a higher profile in the past and set us on a path of expectation. Besides, for "gnomes outside of Kraghammer, it's hard to make a living outside of farming or courier services and "other menial tasks. Tinkering seems to be already a very cluttered business. So how else are they "going to make their means, I suppose, than pilfering here and there? I don't blame them for "that. I just don't want to live it and didn't wish for you to live it either."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I thank you for that. I couldn't imagine my life any different.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just hope it was enough-- you and the mountain man."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, he's my protector for sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. I was hoping he would be. He was my protector at one time, as well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might be a small comfort to know that Pike's doing a wonderful job of changing the Trickfoot name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a hero of the land. Trickfoot is known as hero, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hero? What did you do?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well. I mean, I didn't do it, we all did, but we killed lots of dragons, and, you know, we've done some pretty cool things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's saved a lot of people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus she single-handedly helped lead the rebuilding of a Sarenrae temple in Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Way over in Vasselheim?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've traveled very far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've made the Lady of the Everlight very proud of you, then." (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With the rest of us. And she is one of the finest bakers we have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true. It's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where did you learn to bake?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We would drink a lot, and we would just be in the kitchen sometimes without anything to do, us girls and Taryon, just throwing some shit in a bowl and seeing what we could make.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The best bakers make it up as they go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're all very lucky."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a very precise sort of thing, it's funny, mix things together and then it just turns out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't even have measuring cups, we just kinda pour it all in and shake it up and see what comes out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sounds amazing."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It literally took five minutes to get here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But it's half of a blondie that was made yesterday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did you make this?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, no, I mean, he was making them, but it's our recipe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I made it off of a recipe that she had cultivated, and it's quite-- you'll taste--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go and get some tea, make the rest of the tea for everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, the tea!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got it, I got it. Sit, sit, enjoy. Here, here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a bit stale. Mm."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Imagine if it was fresh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're a very good cleric."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, I know, thank you for your honesty, they're great when they're fresh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll finish this later."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll bring you a profiterolo, 'cause that you will love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But thank you, I greatly appreciate the offer. A bakery? Wow!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The old gnome diabetes!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, just one more thing. So Ogden, in his visions that he's been having, and he told this to Vex, that he saw visions of me dying, basically, by a shadowy--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shadowy being with eyes like burning coal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you'd best be avoiding anything with eyes like coals."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, was it a dream he had, or was it a vision?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a recurring dream, very constant, and it has him very worried, if he's telling the truth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you know if Ogden has found faith?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't ask him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. I can't say. Some given the calling, they don't know why that is given. I'd like to "think that even the most dastardly of characters can be redeemed. My memory of their family is a "dark one, but who am I to judge, as I have not engaged with their path for hundreds of years now? "Maybe you should ask him."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do you think Ogden is dastardly? What did he do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know him that well, I left before we got to become friends."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just going off what you said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just meaning the Trickfoots in general."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So would it be-- (laughs) Would it be different if he had these dreams or visions if he was a follower of Sarenrae or has found faith of some sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Them. Arcane stuff."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tea?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys stay for a bit and have some tea with him and catch up, and let him know more of the adventures that you've had since last you checked up on him in Westruun. Anything else you guys want to work out here in Westruun with Wilhand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just ask him, is there any message you wish to send to Ogden or the rest of the Trickfoots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently there's a family history of diabetes." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just a word of advice I'm throwing out there for their own well-being."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Family history, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And don't be penises."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Very good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wise words.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "See? Told you." (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wilhand? Should you remember anything about this curse that we've asked you about, please send word? We want to protect Pike as much as we can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I understand. I'll look into some books. If I hear anything, I'll send word."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sure it's nothing, but in case you remember anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will be happy to do so."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll just take the rest of it. I'll probably have it on the way home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you sure? I don't mind, it was delicious."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll send some your way that are fresh, I swear they're very good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're very good, I promise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He responds with, "And you're getting better, but perhaps some practice, in time."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll keep working on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Until then, avoid anyone of any sort of gnomish nobility for a while. That's my "recommendation," he says to you in Gnome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, is there anything you need from here before we leave?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think so. Real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I get up and I stand behind him and comb his hair out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been a while since somebody's done that for me. Thank you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It looks so great, just all natural, out, ready for the world, but I wanted to make you just look a little bit more coiffed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. It's a bit unbridled, I would like perhaps to... the word escapes me." And he takes another sip of his tea, thinks for a second, goes, "I wish to be less crazy-looking."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, can I just say, I think you look perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he reaches up and pinches the edge of your cheek and goes, "Well, can I just say that I "never thought blue would be your color, but it looks fantastic."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It hasn't washed out yet, but it's fun for a little bit, just to try something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just to try something. Ah, I remember those days. Anyway. Don't be a stranger."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. It was wonderful to see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wonderful to see you as well. And please, do send me some fresher treats."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for your hospitality.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Thank you for coming. And a pleasure to meet you, uh--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon Darrington.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Taryon Darrington. Pleasure to meet you, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not a firm handshake at all.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys make your way back to Whitestone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way back to Whitestone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys return.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Finish the rest of the blondie through the fshoom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just (chomps) as you step through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stale blondie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stale blondie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JB, Johann, and Astra have been eager, for the most part, asking questions, and some of the time, when you're not looking, kind of flicking the back of the hat. But you've come around now, you're heading back up north after coming from the graveyard, and both the Pelor church and the Raven Queen shrine that have been built there, and you've made your way back northward into the city proper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See the Musketeers. Can we do that? I really want to do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not allowed to say that word out loud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'll hush up around your sister, but it's just us right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, either that or it's like a pub crawl through Whitestone, one or the other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they may be drunk enough. Let's go see the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is there any specific individual that you've set as the captain of the Riflemen of Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your boy. What's his name?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. As you guys approach, making your way towards the northern barracks of the city, you hear a cluster of small, controlled explosions, at which point the gnomes all kind of shudder for a second. In that moment, Ogden goes, (incoherent yelling) "We're under attack!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right, it's all right, it's all part of the tour. No, it's all right. Oh man. It's okay. This is Firecracker Alley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These my people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shots don't have extremely good aim.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many rifles are we looking at, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking at ten different people with rifles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Queen's Grace, that's a lot of guns, Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys approach, gently, as they're preparing for the next shot, you see Kynan bring up his arm and look over and see the rest of you, and immediately changes his posture. He was already in a formal leader position, but as soon as you approach, it's almost like, oh, the boss is here to watch. And he kind of (inhales). "Hold. We have company."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At ease, at ease.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around and jogs up to the edge of the perimeter of this training ground. And he goes, "Hello. By what pleasure do we have you--?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are giving a very rare tour of the grounds and we thought that, these being Trickfoots, as in the family of Trickfoots--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. Oh!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- we would show them one of the things that makes this castle so special, and one of the things that makes this castle so special is you and your company.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it is an honor to have the Trickfoots among us. I am Captain Kynan Leore. I am the, as "to recently assigned, captain of the Riflemen of Whitestone." And you see him go from-- his whole, structured presentation begins to quickly fade as the nerves kick in. You can see his voice get a little quivery and his posture begin to fall a little bit. "These are my Riflemen... and women! It's "called Riflemen, but it's men and women. It's a formality."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It can be changed, it can be changed."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Riflepeople.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, it's been months. You're looking on point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we're trying. They're very, very good people. Aren't they? Yes?" And they all don't know how to answer and look at each other and look at him and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At ease. This man in command of you all is one of the few people who could actually do a little damage to us in our time. He has great respect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He puts his eyes down, slightly sheepishly and guiltily as you say that, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's old history. How are you getting on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just don't want to mess this up."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you being of use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks to Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very much so. I could not think of anyone better for this particular occupation. I am nothing but prideful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then yes, I have been of use."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) How's Simon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh!" He looks over at the rest of the folk and goes, "At ease! Go get some food." The men break and make their way walking out--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And women. Because there's men and women.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just like equality for all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he leans in and says, "Simon is doing well." And he pulls up the front of his armor a little bit and you can see the snake belt itself is still on him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Can I say hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean--" Glances over at the men not watching-- and women.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm showing off some trick shots to the Trickfoots while we're--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need to specify.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very different show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no. It's a whole different pit in Whitestone to go to. He goes ahead and does a little whistle, and suddenly the belt turns into a snake and winds its way up the forearm and (hisses).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck! Buddy! Can I hold him for a minute?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah! Well, he's still yours."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The snake leaps to your arm and coils around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey! Hey! You are bigger. What is he feeding you? What are you feeding him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Belt!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, nothing. It's a--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I fed him. I mean, you don't have to, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can! I can feed him. I just didn't think-- It's a belt! I don't know-- "I'll feed him."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When was the last time this belt was a snake, before now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When you give it to me. I haven't had to use it! And then should I let it out? I don't "know. I don't know how these things work, okay?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not everyone can be a dope adventurer, all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm conflicted here. I did give this to you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. You gave me a belt. And I've used it, and it's been great."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I insight check Simon to see how he's feeling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! With your extensive knowledge of magical snake belts, let's see how well this goes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, this is all bullshit, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I love it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's insight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm gonna use wisdom. Excuse me, I'm going to use Luck. Oh, that's much better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blow that Luck, baby!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Yeah. He seems fine. As a magical snake, it can transform back and forth. It doesn't appear to require food or water when it's in its belt form. It wouldn't necessarily be conscious of the time in between. So as far as Simon's concerned, it's been a very short period of time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, Vax?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are happy here-- happier here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm very glad for that. You seem happy. And everybody deserves a second chance. And I guess what I'm asking is: can I have my snake back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Yes! Here, I mean he was-- I was just borrowing it for a while."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I missed him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Yeah."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so glad I can't hear any of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he looks over at Percy doing all these trick shots in the air and throwing things up and, like, showing the spinning. And the gnomes are like, "Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As you can see, Firecracker Alley was constructed after the revolt of the Haybales of 1874... 39.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I let Simon crawl down and form a belt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I give Kynan just a gentle little clap on the cheek and say, I'm glad you're fitting in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me too. And thank you. Sorry about not feeding your snake. I didn't--" (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you're well on your way to being that hero you dreamed of when you were younger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, thank you, I was-- " (gun noise) And his rifle goes off like in the ground next to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A big plume of dirt next to him, and he goes, "Uh--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Happens to the best of us. You got all your toes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you shook him a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So how do you feel your tour has gone so far? Are you feeling educated, enthused?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All of that! All of it, honestly." Johann at this point is still enthralled and goes, "Where "does one procure such a weapon?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One does not, sadly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're very rare outside of this castle, and traditionally when they're found outside of this castle, they're collected and the owner is often killed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to know! Good to know, Astra." And Astra goes, "What?! I think it's sexy." And Johann's like, "If you have one lying around you don't need, just let me-- "

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will let you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey Percy, I feel like we should end with, like, a big bang. Like, you know, like, the goods of Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The old apple-in-the-hand?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Do you think Grog and I could shoot a gun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah? Grog, we're gonna shoot guns!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He just said, he gave permission!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will say yes to this. Not one of my guns, but thankfully we have a couple of the ones that are a little wonky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The standard rifles. You do have those, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you show me how it works?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kind of, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll be fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouts) Gun, please!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you guys are outfitted with two rifles. They're not loaded yet. You can show them how to load it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm showing them through the basics of loading the powder. I do this very quickly, so I know it's very difficult to see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very fast, yes. I load it for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You load it for each of them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One at a time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because this could go poorly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not loading it ourselves?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome to try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am a self-made man. I would like to try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will let Percy load my gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Percy loads your gun. Grog, make an intelligence check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give him an ample amount of powder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. You give him an ample amount of powder, and he uses it. He uses it the right way. It's a lot of it. But I mean, overall, he got the gist of it, and he's-- (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you have disadvantage on this one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not going to need it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus dex modifier?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it wasn't a misfire, at the very least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little off, but you managed to at least make contact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very solid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did his feet come off the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but it does come up and you have to catch yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a bit of kick to these. You feel it in the shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion noise) When you do fire, nothing reacts. None of the hay reacts, and there's a pause, and about 300 feet back, you watch as a small tree goes (cracking, heavy impact).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that the Sun Tree?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could go stick it up and cover it with tape and stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are dangerous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Extremely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There shouldn't be too many of these.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There should not, which is why if we find them outside this castle, it's taken care of, one way or another.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a quick load shot just to air it out a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do, and it's a really rapid reload. We're talking Schwarzenegger T-2. Spin the shotgun one-handed. (gunshot)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a hundred yards away. Shouldn't he have to roll to see if he shoots me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you shooting at Grog?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The rifle doesn't have a super long range, either. It's more of a stopping power weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll, with proficiency and your dex modiifer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't shoot with your gun, you shoot with your heart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The same target, Vax, the impact of the head you hit, you watch as the entire upper part of its torso and head (explosion noise) explode into a spray of slightly seared and slightly burning hay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will never, ever outlive the shame I feel for inventing these. I put it back down. Walk away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From 300 yards away, I yell, (muffled) it is not the Sun Tree! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he runs back, you can see as Johann's like, "Is there any chance that we could shoot one?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what? I'm going to say yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Astra's (squeals).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One at a time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look at each other and they both jump off the carpet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not just for what you're shooting at--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not even listening. They're both picking up the two rifles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're both empty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They pick them up and are looking at it and holding it upward and aiming it sideways. They don't really know how to do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go a little Luciferian here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm back in security guard mode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you help them load it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to load one at a time. I'm going to mis-load; I'm going to let the powder roll so it creates a flashpan. It's going to be a big, ugly, loud mess. It's not going to fire a shot. It's just going to be a big, ugly mess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're making a blank?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm making a blank. I'm making a blank with a powder pop. It's going to be a little singe-y.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I just pull right here on the thing? Right "over here?" (explosion) Before he finishes, it goes off. It goes flying from his hand, and he stands there for a second with his hands open, and as he turns back towards you, you can see there's a little bit of singe on his eyebrows. The burst of the smoke and the flash seared the front of his face ever so slightly. He turns to you and goes, "That was amazing. Did I hit it?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You hit something. Well done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hit it! You're up, lady." Astra's like, "Oh!" and she runs up. Takes the gun. Same thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, just because I'm curious, I'm going to give her a normal shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you load it properly. She takes it and aims at one of the other targets. (gunshot) She manages to hold onto it; this one doesn't blast out of her hand. You don't see any point of impact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's like, "Ow!" and she releases her hand because of the heat of the barrel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She puts it on the ground and goes, "That was fun. I'm good."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (panting) I heard shots. What's the problem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you look down and notice that there's a little bit of bleeding from your knee, and there's a small bullet hole that you didn't notice as you were running back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Sun Tree was angry. It may have taken revenge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whines, groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It only went in an inch. It wasn't that hard of an impact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, as you guys are heading back now, after the rest of your tour, you meet up with the rest of the party. As you guys finish the tour--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A minor thing. As we're walking back, I sidle up next to Percy and I don't say anything. I just do that friend thing where you just go-- and I keep walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax bumps you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to show them the sphere?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I think that we've had enough for the evening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? That's the craziest thing in this town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I have to fill out so much paperwork for that one. We'll do it next time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. You know, I do know how to write a few letters now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you would like to try and fill out the paperwork...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's not get carried away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, then. I certainly am not up to it, so I completely understand if you're not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys catch up with the rest of the party, and you all make your way to the castle at about the same time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just checking. None of the gnomes had even the slightest tinge of reaction when he said that? Or no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Other than when I was shooting the gun, I've been watching them like a hawk, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even a twitch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No reaction. No twitch. They have no idea what you were talking about, and they have not stolen anything. You've been keeping a close eye.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except your heart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ain't that the truth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck should we do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps it's time to have a difficult conversation.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think so. I'd like to talk to Ogden again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. Right." She goes and takes a piece of bread and soaks it in the soup for a second and puts it in his mouth. He chews on it for a bit, and as you walk over, he pushes JB's hand out of the way and goes, "Oh, young Pike. Hello."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello. Did you have a good time today?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did. I haven't had a rest like that in a long time."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your city gets very loud."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It gets pretty loud here. It's true. I take it you went to Firecracker Alley?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's the one."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it's real loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JB peeks over Ogden's shoulder, listening in. "It was quite nice, actually. We got to watch "them fire these--" "Anyway!" Ogden pushes in, not even paying attention to her. "It's so good to see you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Will you take a walk with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JB's like, "Oh. Where would you like to go?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well... I just would love to spend some time with you alone, Uncle Ogden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JB, you watch her face go--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll spend some time with you, as well, JB. I just want to make sure I get time with everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Enjoy. I'll just--" And she goes back to her meal and begins cutting it up with fervor or frustration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take JB and ask her, did you happen to see my home on the tour?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know where you live."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like to see? I'd love to show you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She sidelong glances at Pike helping Ogden up as they begin to make their way out. "You know "what? Yes. I would love that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I take her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys begin making your way. While they exit, because Ogden's a little slower, you and Ogden eventually make your way out to the front part of the castle, walking along the side grounds. He's with his cane, walking. "What did you wish to discuss, young Pike?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm blanking right now. Is there a temple of Sarenrae here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a smaller scale. The larger temples here are for Pelor and such and you've been away. Most of your focus has been in Vasselheim and Emon, so you haven't done the full temple construct here, but there's a small shrine that you've built so at least you can go there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would love to walk you to something that I was a part of building and creating here in the city, if you'd like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Lead the way. I am your guest. I am here at your behest."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I walk him to the shrine of Sarenrae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody's currently in the process of upkeep; there isn't a need for it. Some fallen leaves, and it's a little dirty on some of the benches, but you brush it off and you both sit on the bench, looking up at the big winged statue of her. He sits down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you know where we are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No idea."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is a shrine of Sarenrae, who I follow, and I wanted to bring you here because I wanted to share it with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. It's very peaceful."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) How are you feeling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After looking around for a minute, he leans into you and goes, "Pike, we need to talk. I've "been tying together the missing pieces of our history for most of my life. This information has "helped me once before, and as I'm sure has been discussed at length with your friends, there is a "curse upon this bloodline. My research has brought me some knowledge, and I've been able to cast this "curse out of one Trickfoot before, but I failed once before that. And I miss her to this day. Do "you want to know the history of our curse?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I am here to try and help, if I can. If you'll have me."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow. That's a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've had an entire lifetime to think and learn and research and regret."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How long have you been having visions, in terms of this happening with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is only over the past couple of years, but I knew not where to find you until you sent "your letter."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And what are your thoughts on JB?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's a bit distracted, at times. She cares much "for the stories of you and your friends. The poor thing's been at my side for the majority of her "youth. I feel like a burden. She looks after me and not much else, so she lives vicariously "through the stories she manages to assemble of you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And she knows about all this, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They all know. We've had time to speak. I was the one that insisted we come see you, and I "do apologize for the rest of them. They are unique."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I think I was at first shocked, and I feel like I need to apologize for my trepidation and wariness at first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's understood. Like I said, we have a reputation. One that you've, as far as what I've "heard, been able to kick to the curb."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sneezes)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just little fairies, sneezing fairies, around here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's adorable. I don't see them."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You usually don't. You just hear them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't see much, anyway."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay. You said you've had some successes in releasing this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've cast it out once before. I've been trying to define a ritual that can do so."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do you define this ritual? Is this under any sort of faith that you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's good for the fiber."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It sure is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps you or another individual of a clerical background could do so, and it does take some time "to hallow it. But with the ground hallowed, and the moon is full, I can perform the exorcism. Now, "should the shades be strong enough to survive the exorcism, as they have once before, it will be up "to you and your friends to slay them while they're bound on that land. And if you cast them to the "shadows where they came, the blood curse on you would be no more."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But they'll come back again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are passed on through the bloodline."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there any way to get rid of them forever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Choice is yours."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you want to perform the exorcism on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're the one the visions brought me to."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, this is something that I'll have to think about. We'll have to talk about it with everybody else, especially if it involves them, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Take your time. They're about-- JB? JB, how close are we to the full moon?" He's shouting out into nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nature check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nature check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let me find a d20. Oh, ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure. You're not very involved or invested in the cycles of the moon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, I could talk to Keyleth about that. She would know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And thank you for telling me all of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for being so kind to family that you owe nothing to."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm very grateful that you're here, and even though our last name has a reputation, I'm proud to be a Trickfoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That warms my heart, and to hear you say that, maybe one day I will be, as well, before my "time is up."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think we can make that happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There it is."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, let's go back. I have some thinking to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Your gray blob is very nice."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Yes, she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for showing me. If you don't mind?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) You guys begin to slowly make your way back to Castle Whitestone. That's where we're going to take our break. We'll come back here in a few minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Kill him, Pike! Kill the bearer of bad news.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Flame Strike! All right, guys. We'll be back here in just a minute. We do have another Wyrmwood giveaway in the chat room. This is for this awesome--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we still going?

lines.name: CREW
lines.text: It's still going.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lacewood deck box.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it made of lace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's made of wood that is lacy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is really pretty. I haven't seen that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm kind of jelly. Why didn't we get lacewood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations! You won your fantastic Wyrmwood card case. It will come to you, signed by the cast, for you to put things inside. Put things inside! Put many things inside. Now! Back into the game, guys. So, Pike. Having walked him back to the castle, we'll jump in for a moment as Vex, you've been leading JB.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She walks alongside you at a comfortable three-foot distance, but she's walking with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know you can walk next to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am walking next to you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought she was walking behind me. Is she walking next to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's behind and to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, seriously. Come over here. I don't want to turn my head when I'm talking to you, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right." She quickens her pace. You know, gnomish gait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk slower. So this is my home. We just built it. Isn't it wonderful?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's beautiful."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's it like having a home?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I went a long time without one, as well. It feels wonderful to finally have someplace to settle down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's very nice. We're always moving from place to place."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Why is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can't afford to put stakes down anywhere, and it doesn't take long for people to "figure out who we are."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Trickfoots?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yes. I know. I know that. But my experience with Trickfoots has always been pleasant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're very good people. Johann has done a lot "for us, but he's more prideful than the rest of us. As soon as anyone starts any shit, he's the "first to get in their face about it. He's a fiery one. It's why Astra took to him."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's fiery as well, it seems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's something."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you could settle down anywhere, where would it be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably right here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whitestone is quite wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's very nice. People here are far less dubious than the folks in "Kymal, at the very least."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike's buttered us up quite well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I miss her a lot. We grew up together. I don't know if you knew that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I heard. How old was she when she left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know the specifics of it, but me and her were both in our first decade."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was that like, having Pike leave and you staying behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We were friends. She was my only friend, at the time. I've always been a reader. They tell me "the first of my kind, so I didn't take to making new friends very well. That, and Uncle needs "someone to look after him, and I didn't really want to drop the ball on that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you're a good person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm a person."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like to see the library?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have a library?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's growing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, please!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how big the library is right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) In Castle Whitestone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it's my particular--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, your personal library? It's not huge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm growing it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but it took a while to construct it, and then some books have made their way in. It's maybe a third full, but as you show her, she's like, "What kind of books do you have?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, a lot of books about really terrible gods. Some good gods. Oh! I have something about the Feywild; I remember picking that up. Would you like to learn about the Feywild?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. I've only heard a few things."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go dig through my books and find it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes her straightened hair to the side, and she nervously steps back with it and smiles with her little gap tooth. "Are you sure?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course. Have you ever learned anything about the curse on your family? Have you seen that in books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think he wants to try and help."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Have you ever seen anyone be affected by it, personally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not in my lifetime. The last one Ogden went to was before our time, me and Pike. It doesn't "happen often-- the vision, at least."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know if it's a coming of age thing or not."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you've never had any visions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. I wish I did. That would be interesting. Would be different."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are quite different. That's something to be proud of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes the book. (sighs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, one of my very best friends, Taryon Darrington, is an incredible writer, and I bet if you told him about the curse, he'd be willing to write it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes. You would go into complete detail about it, and he would make it sound very interesting. Maybe we could have somebody draw pictures for it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stutters) "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trickfoots could be legends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you already have one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yes. But there are multiple chapters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Well, we'd have to talk to Uncle Ogden about that; "he knows it better than anybody."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, yes. We'll sit down with him, but I bet you know quite a few details, as well, having taken care of him for so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe. I don't know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should find Tary. Take that with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're sure?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes. We can talk about it on the way back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." She follows after you as you guys head back to the castle. Eventually you guys stumble up to the castle, and there's Taryon with Doty. What are you guys in the process of doing right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's combing my hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 33, 34, 35. Oh, LE Girl. How are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I told her what a wonderful writer you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, yes. Unpublished as of yet, as we all know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a growing book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Budding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. And I told her it might be fun if we wrote down a little about the Trickfoots and their curse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something so other people can learn about them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a short story or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, sure, they could write something like that. I would maybe even read it someday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I want her to tell you about it, and you can write it down. That way we have all the details.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, you're such a wonderful writer, dear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am a wonderful writer, but, you know, my story has intrigue and danger and romance--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's all those things in the curse, darling. Maybe just write a new book for the time being, just a small other book?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems like a bit of a downer, just a book about a curse, I mean. You know how it's gonna end. Someone's gonna get cursed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Oh. Oh! Yes. Yes! Of course. I would be happy to take down her story. Yes, absolutely, if she'll share it with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if she's willing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He knows more than I do about it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, of course, you can just tell us a little bit about it while we go get him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could call it an outline and then Ogden can fill in the details later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course. Flourish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the curse seems to manifest when a Trickfoot falls too deep into the spell of selfishness or dark thoughts and habits, and manifests in these shades that eventually hollow them out to the point where they are nothing but a being of avarice and greed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of greed, hm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it's part of the reason that we have such a bad reputation. Those that befell the curse "kind of tore a path through the countryside."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now, you say 'hollowed out by shades'. Do you still look like a normal gnome, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't seen anyone. I don't know. This is stuff that I heard from Uncle Ogden."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. I wonder what that looks like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hopefully we never find out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no, obviously. But just for detail, so we can illustrate it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The curse only manifests itself in those who bring it upon themselves with greed, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those that draw too close to it, that's what I know about it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, how can Pike be at risk, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That seems odd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's one of the most generous people I've ever known.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless she's doing things that we don't know about.

lines.name: LAURA
