lines.text: No. (laughs) No. It's Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know. That's why I'm worried."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, your narrative was crude and the language not at all descriptive, but I think we have the building blocks to work with here for something that we could turn into, you know, like an essay. An essay of some sort.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A good short book with a lot of drawings--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not a book, not a book at all, nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- leather cover with embossing on it or something quite lovely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think it would be thick enough for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gold filigree, probably, something just very beautiful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A pamphlet, maybe. A big pamphlet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's nodding. "All right, yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll work on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Let's head back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I should go." You join up with Pike and Ogden. You guys reconvene, now. It's getting later in the day, dusk is taking. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry. I got so many details about the curse, I know all about it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, great. I got some details, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I think-- I would love to get everybody together and just talk some stuff out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good call. Should this just be Vox Machina?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, just like us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy. The string's leaving a mark in my chin and cheeks. I feel like now is a good time to put the hat back in its place of holding. Will you guide me to the hallowed area from whence it came?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How would you know that it's leaving a mark if you had not disturbed the string? It's very important.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It itches, and I feel deadening of the skin in this U-shape.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you saying that it's too difficult for you to wear, that it's not working?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. It's staying on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just wanted to know if you wanted it back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me know when you are finished with it, and when it is time to retire it, I will make sure that it goes back to its resting place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Meal is prepared for the guesting Trickfoots, specified to keep separate from wherever you decide to have your meal, but you manage to gather the rest of Vox Machina at your behest to have a discussion, I imagine probably in one of your chambers, separately from the rest of the castle, where you can talk in private. So as you all slowly gather within, we'll say Pike's room for the simplicity of this, close the door behind you, and you have all been brought together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have a really big room, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it is very large.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, not that I'm comparing, I'm just, it's very nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I don't need this much room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think my sister likes you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, we do get along very well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've called us together for a reason?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I talked to-- and I know you got information, too-- I talked to Ogden, and he told me some stuff that's a little disturbing, but I guess, you know, way back in our family there were these brothers, and one of them sort of was overcome with jealousy, and he killed the other one, and basically, long story short, our family has had a curse because of that action, and Ogden wants to perform an exorcism on me to get rid of this thing. But I don't feel any different, I don't feel like I have anything, and he said, you know, we would all have to be a part of it and go on a mountaintop while there's a full moon, and I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This seems weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's heavy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When you list it out like that, really weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bit odd. Seems a bit odd.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Most times, family comes into town, you show them a couple sights--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You drink a lot of wine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- yeah, they leave. This seems like a strange family visit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a curse on you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, JB said it was brought upon by greed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And avarice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen, buddy, you just learned the letter 'u' to say 'u-shaped', I think you should call that a win.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: JB said that you would have to bring this curse on yourself. Have you been up to-- be straight with us, we're all on the same team, here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not doing any drugs like Scanlan was?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you sure you don't have greed in your heart? Lust in your heart?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike, you look me in the eye.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a lie in that little soul of hers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's hard to take you seriously, ever, but even more so now with that ridiculous hat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe you should take it off, it's kind of annoying--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't let these people tear you down, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At what point will (strained) the lack of circulation begin to make you talk like this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm gonna get you for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And also, I mean, if we take you at your word, and of course we do, so the curse, you-- you're very in tune with divine things and with curses and things of fiendish nature. You don't sense anything in yourself. It doesn't really add up. Is it possible-- I mean, they're family, and I know you love them to a degree-- but is it possible they're jerking you around?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Anything's possible. I just-- I don't feel like they're lying. Unless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't feel like they're telling the whole truth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I don't feel like they're telling the whole truth, but I think something's there, and I can't seem to get to the bottom of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you prayed to Sarenrae?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. I haven't, yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we're not one to speak on curses and bad things not existing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what about a second opinion? Like one time it was really burning when I was peeing, and the guy's like, oh, eat this and it'll be fine, and I was like, mm, I'm gonna get a second opinion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was cranberry juice, Grog, and that was a solid opinion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it actually turned out to be true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a very good analogy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we do this: what if we go up to the mountain, full moon, go through the motions, and Keyleth, you're super-powerful, you must have some sort of way of telling if this Ogden is telling the truth, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Um. I could look at his face and his weird tics and deduce very hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Talk to his tics. Does he have tics?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When is the next full moon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I remembering that incorrectly?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe just try to cure yourself of this curse. Is that possible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. Four days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'd have to start right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other option is-- and I've been holding onto it 'cause it's valuable-- I do happen to have a Potion of Mind Reading, so we could go up there with him and I could just read his mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could also do that now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But what if he thinks he's telling the truth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is the smartest thing you've ever said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This fucking hat is magic! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if-- how much of that potion do you have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One. I have one of it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, gnomes are small, what if we give them all a shot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We take the potion, and then we read their minds.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I understand. I think I thought--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was kinda with you there. Okay, hang on. I mean, we're, as Taryon said, awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I said that about you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was being generous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we just go through with this, is there any harm in that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should start, at the very least. My worry is, if I understand this curse correctly, the only person I think that could possibly be at risk from it would be JB.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Think about it. What avarice have any of us ever experienced from Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't even know what that word means.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like, if you were to just define avarice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, it's sinful in a sort of vague way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I don't even--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket doesn't even know, and he knows everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scholars maintain...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What I'm saying is perhaps--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Google? Maybe we could Google it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please do, actually. Google avarice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's having hate in your heart? I think?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hate and greed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it was pride.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hate, greed, pride, any of the seven deadly sins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is avarice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Tary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a covet-ness, it's someone is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, I feel like we're really getting off the point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The point I'm trying to make is, and I'm having a notion--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My apologies for using a word with a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five-dollar word.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did you use an SAT word, Matt? Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I read a lot of books growing up, I'm sorry!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doesn't say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pronounced av-riggle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The point I'm trying to make in all of this is that perhaps they're trying to save one of their own, and perhaps they need to move the curse to another Trickfoot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's just greed. It's just greed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like I said, greed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, wait, I have a question. What if all of them are actually cursed, and they're trying to bring you in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh. Ooh! That's a good thought. We kill all of them. No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes! Of course. They'll be easily killed, they're half our size.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did Ogden say this exorcism entailed?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He said that we go to the highest mountain, we have to wait 'til a full moon, you have to have it be hallowed ground, and just sort of set up a ritual, and he said maybe we could get help from whomever, and I was thinking of Vax, and I don't know! This is so beyond anything that I know!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then what would happen? We just send the curse out of you and all is well?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I guess? This sounds so ridiculous as I'm saying it out loud.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, do you want to go see another cleric and see if you even need to exercise or not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very fit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very strong.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have four days 'til a full moon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should start consecrating the ground, at the very least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, do we really imagine whatever trouble they might be bringing to Pike's doorstep is something we can't handle? I mean, we've dealt with pretty terrible things. I have a hard time imagining it could be worse-- I'm not saying it's not dangerous, it should be--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Avarice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I got a nosebleed. We could just do-- I mean, Keyleth could do her trick of turning us into ladybugs or flies or whatever and we could all hang out and follow along. I mean, mind-reading first.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think you're allowed to be there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we can be there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can just be there, they don't care? Oh. I was shooting guns today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ogden at dinner the other night said that each generation is affected by a blood curse, and he believes it's you in this generation? Because you and JB are in the same age, right? So you're the same generation. So maybe Percy's theory isn't quite wrong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy's very smart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tend to veer towards the worst-case scenario. Somebody has to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will JB be there at the exorcism?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to make sure she is, just in case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or isn't, just in case. Right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. If there is a curse, and she is affected, it would be good to get it out of her as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what if it goes out of Pike and into her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if it goes out of her and into Pike?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, so many variables.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should all be there together, because stronger in numbers, and if Pike's lying to us we kill her, and if JB's lying to us we kill her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, hold on. Well, okay, yeah. If it comes down to that, everybody, we have to know that that has to be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) We're not going to kill you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, if you're infected with evil, we might have to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what does it do? Do you turn into a crazy beast?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have no idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, do you get tentacles?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's-- I feel like that would be an upgrade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not really that bad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. I doubt that's what it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we're approaching this the wrong way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm intrigued by this mind-reading serum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never used it, so it should probably work great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much was that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: About a thousand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, maybe Ogden just isn't telling you things because he's so old, it's locked away and he doesn't remember. You know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we just have to ask?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would check both of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All of them. And Astra.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long does it last?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can only, I think, investigate one person-- or gnome-- at a time, but then I can move the spell to other people. Let me-- Doty, give me my notes on the spell that I took. Hold on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What time is it right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushing close to dusk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should perhaps do this while we're setting up the ritual.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since it'll just be up there and it'll be natural to talk about this subject.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And to not go when it's a full moon, so we don't actually have to do it, but we can set it up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Exactly. It's going to take several days, and I'm sure we're going to need their help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can shift my attention to other creatures' thoughts, or go deeper into the same creature's mind. So I can do some surface scans, and then if I get a hit, I can go deeper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Prod your fingers deep into the recesses, the nooks and crannies of their--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course, I still defer to you as my teammates. I don't have to be the one who takes this serum. I did pay for it, but if one of you wanted to do the probing, you could buy it off me, I suppose.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I feel like they wouldn't be as on-guard with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, plus we already said you're gonna write a book about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. It fits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's an interview.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could also just take them out for a drink and get their guard down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't look like you're reading someone's mind when you're doing it, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't have to do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can definitely do it to Ogden first, then, 'cause he won't be able to tell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't see, so if you look weird, he won't know. Perfect cover.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In case you have to look weird. Do you have to look weird while you do this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you are dressed like a Faberge egg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are welcome to look weird while you do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like that's a compliment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go with that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there anything-- do one of you guys wanna-- can one of you guys check me to see if there's something in there that I don't know? Vax?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't look in her ear--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so. I mean, you're the holiest person in this city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you check yourself? Just pray to Sarenrae, see if she'll give you a little hint.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't you have that Divine Intervention-y thing? That Dear Sarenwae-- Sarenrae.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tonight I'll see if maybe I can get some answers. But should we-- do we do this tonight, this mind-reading serum?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say tomorrow on the mountain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was gonna say-- it's four days, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we've got to start right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I think we do it while we're up there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it four days and on that night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four nights from tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four nights from tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we have to start this immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty soon. Make a history check, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No one bothered to listen to any of my exciting stories about my home. All right, that's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As far as-- from what Pike told you-- as far as high up in the mountains, and a good place that you can imagine for a moonlit ceremony, there is a place. It's a rock shelf to the northeast of Whitestone on the Salted Bluffs. It's called the Dawn Table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Dawn Table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a rock shelf used for prayer when the spring rolls around. A lot of fishermen go there and leave offerings. It's meant to bring-- I wouldn't say a good harvest, but a good season for catching fish and trying to bring food back to Whitestone, so that's pretty high up. It's gonna be probably about two and a half days' travel on foot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we can carpet or teleport.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you have a way of getting there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there trees nearby? Are there trees nearby?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll see if I can recall if there's a tree nearby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're like pine tree, that wide at the most, and you need a pretty thick tree to Transport Via Plants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can get us close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can certainly get closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can cut off about half a day's travel, about a day's worth of travel, I guess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can also travel via being clouds, like we've done in the past.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We really don't wanna walk? It's so lovely out. Danger is at an all-time low.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's rained a lot this winter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it okay to leave everyone here while we go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's only a few days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got the Musketeers guarding the place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan's on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, okay. If it's two and a half days' journey, and we're planning on doing this, then we would have to take Ogden and the gnomes and all things needed for this ritual, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It means we would at least be framing it like we're committing. I mean, that gives you a long hike to be able to talk and mind-read the gnomes while we walk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It lasts for one minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It gives you a solid good minute of hiking to read the gnomes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe during the ritual set-up because, I don't know, would it work while you're walking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, maybe, but I feel like we wait for the big moment, and then see what's going on in his head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's more dramatic that way, anyway, for the book. And for our lives.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And, just so you guys know, I've been discussing with what Vex knows about it as well. I think, from what he said, it's like a bunch of shapes come out, and we would all have to fight them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shades.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shades, shades, shades.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Way to bury the lede, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I forgot about that. My b.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like, I'm cool with shapes, but.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a rhombus, anything but that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, shades coming from you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the curse? JB had mentioned that the shades infest someone and hollow them out. I don't know what that translates to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax. Can you do a thing to look inside of Pike?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, x-ray her!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try it, just try it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The best I can do-- I mean, I can cast Divine Sense and Lay On Hands and-- I mean, I can-- poison and disease are things I can help with, but not--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you don't even know. Give it a try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Divine Sense? Divine Sense. That sounds like something real--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's find out if you're a fiend or undead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ... you get nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's not wearing a wire. She's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there some embarrassing thing hidden, tucked away, that you don't like to talk about? Like, are you afraid of pickles or you don't want to be--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I mean, I talk about everything with you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no secrets that you have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't chew on your own toenails or anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No singular secret that you've kept from the entire group the entire time we've known you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like chewing on your own toenails is the worst villain origin possible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Of course I chew on my own toenails. I mean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's not some deep secret that you're keeping from us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I mean, I think about one time with Scanlan--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, I feel like a story was starting!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was about to say something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I don't do anything that bad!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know. I don't know if there's anything in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm highly dubious of this entire endeavor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you need to talk to Sarenrae.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well, when should we leave?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, two and a half days, I can teleport us closer, and then we can either hike or cloud the rest of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you be able to cloud the gnomes too, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably not in one casting but you could do double-cast, like two trips and get all of you up pretty quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then we'll be sitting there for two days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With the gnomes or the tree stride? Or Teleport Via Plants?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Teleport Via Plants, whoever can fit through there in that short time, you can probably get you guys and the gnomes through, but referring to your Wind Walk, which, how many targets can that affect at once? Up to ten willing creatures.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And there's how many gnomes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you'd leave one behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then we'd leave one behind. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, you'd have to talk to them about that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are there any other clerics that we know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not in town on your level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's Keeper Yennen, but he's like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, where did Kash go to in the last year?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kash has been in Vasselheim.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, and Vasselheim is chock full of clerics, so maybe we could find help there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gilmore's out of town.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Maybe we go ask them and say--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yennen?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The family. I mean, it sounds crazy, but maybe we just go up there, go through the motions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's your show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do it. I'm going to get some tents and some food put together, so we're at least comfortable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we walking, or can we get some horses at least?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not really horse-accessible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be fine, Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm worried about the big guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The big guy will be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess he can just walk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can cloud-stride as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no, Doty can't mist-form, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can Trinket and Doty ride in your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Doty, I've tried to put him in the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of us, in theory, should actually perhaps take the carpet so we can put Doty on the carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sitting on the carpet right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How heavy is Doty?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me look at Matt's statistics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty technically counts as a creature, though it is, much like a golem or a construct of some kind, it would be considered a creature. It is a construct. So in theory, you would have to tell Doty, "Doty, turn into wind." And that probably would work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would take a slot out of our ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How fast does this cloud thing move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It moves pretty quick. 300 feet. Flying speed of 300, which is ten times as fast as you walk. And without-- going straight up the mountain, you could make the full journey, talking with Percy about this, from the base of the mountain to the Dawn Table in about two hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We wouldn't even need the tree-stride, to be honest, we could just do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, from here to the base of the mountain?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, we could do from the base of the mountain to the top in two hours, three hours, but we could make the entire journey quite quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So she could just double-cast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The entire journey you could make in about six and a half hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Solid. So some people go up, you come back, turn the rest of the people in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With my tree-stride.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without tree-stride.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With the gas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go glamping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go glamping. But as long as I can sleep afterwards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll bring tents, we're going to bring some nice tents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts for eight hours, so you'll be using most of the duration to get there, you could probably fly back if you want to, or tree-stride back if you had a tree you could find up there to do it. So yeah, you could do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So what do you do? You go and gather up the other Trickfoots? You approach the rest of them, Ogden, JB.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not leaving tonight, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whenever you guys want to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tonight? This is the same night we got back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right, it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we'll leave in the morning, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At dawn, we leave.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I'll go to them at dinner. Okay, so we've had some discussions and I think it'll take us a little bit of time to get up there and do whatever setting-up you need to do on the top of the mountain, so we were thinking, if you guys are okay with this, of leaving tomorrow morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see Johann and Astra kind of turn over to Ogden. Ogden goes, "Yes, that would be "perfect. When is the next full moon?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's in four days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Four days, all right. That gives us time to prepare. I need a few things for this ritual."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know how to retrieve them necessarily. I require a jug of water that has "been blessed by a priest of the Moonweaver." The Moonweaver is one of the gods, largely elven worship. You guys have crossed a number of temples that worship the Moonweaver in Syngorn and some other-- you do find them occasionally in civilization, but they're more the kind of shrines that you find out in the center of the forest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can totally get that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goddess of the moonlight and autumn. He says, "Also, as part of a reagent for the "exorcism, a diamond worth no less than 1,000 gold pieces that will be "consumed by the actual ritual."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's doable, I believe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I also need a solid pound of dried lavender, and a half a pound of powdered sulfur."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pretty sure we have access to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And, of course, you, Pike. And that should be sufficient to complete the ritual."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's not going to be injured in this ritual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no. Either the shade is cast out and destroyed, or it's cast out and then you destroy "it. Either way, you should be fine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the one shade, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depends."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've done this before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Twice. Three times."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it's always gone right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's gone right twice."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What happened the time it didn't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was the first time. I didn't know what I was in for, and I couldn't save them."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. What do the people look like after they've been taken over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, at least from what I've seen, they "continue to take until somebody cuts them down."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they just look like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They just look like themselves. But their whole personality changes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. I'm encouraged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe they just turned into an asshole.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That just sounds like someone who's an asshole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing a little lavender and sulfur can't cure, in my experience.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't feel any of these things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What I've seen are just the visions I've had. If you wish not to go through with this, that "is up to you. We can leave and be on our way. I've just come to help if we can. If we do this ritual "and nothing comes of it, then you're right as rain."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any inkling of what would happen if you do nothing? Pike does nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps not now, but someday in the future, when met with a terrible choice, if you choose a "darker path, that may be the window needed for the shades to take hold and begin to install in their "dark interests."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any elements needed for this? Water, fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I need some blessed water."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which I'm totally going to go get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, you did say that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have the lavender.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sulfur represents the earth, the diamond represents the refraction of the moonlight, and the water is the catalyst.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the lavender and sulfur?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lavender is to be burned. The sulfur represents the earth in this place, but the lavender is burned as a sort of incense that helps provide a space of the hallowed ground to present a cage for this entity so it cannot flee and come back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We gotta find a priest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go get a pound for good measure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? To one of the temples of the Moonweaver or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could probably get most of that in Syngorn with one trip, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Solid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if what you're seeing, Ogden, and I mean no disrespect in any way, is a possible outcome or future that might not ever happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then Pike will be safe, I'll look the fool, and we'll go our separate ways."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's a diamond?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's a diamond for our dear Pike? It's a good price, I say.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I say what you say that is what I say. I say, you know what? I'm bored and I think we should do it, even if it's hogwash. No offense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None taken."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And as Percy and Tary, as the science bros have said several times, at least a negative outcome is still an outcome, or something like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something similar to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We'll learn things for science.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For science!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: For science.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good bumper sticker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should probably go to Syngorn before it gets too late.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get the lavender and sulfur together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have lavender with my armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You need a pound of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured, let's just get double what we need, just to be safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to be safe. Do you have two pounds of lavender?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need half a pound.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you just tuck it in to make it smell nice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can cause existing lavender to bloom stronger, otherwise the lavender you create in the space will vanish once the spell is done. But yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not in my-- I keep it in a box with my armor so the armor won't smell like shit anymore, people. It's not-- is there a problem with a man having lavender in his possession?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You keep your armor in a box filled with lavender?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so it smells fresh and clean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it smell fresh and clean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It does now, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've had 12 months of downtime to figure my shit out. My armor is tight now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your armor now smells like a grandmother's bathroom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take your guilt trips and bring them back to dad. I don't need them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you talking about? I'm on my way to go give those guilt trips.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have little potpourri bags in almost everything I own.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He does, it's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He started leaving them around the house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He calls them sachets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys go to bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go to Syngorn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I attune to my blood axe instead of the thrower before I go to sleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grabbing a few tents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have supplies for you at the ready. You gather them easily from the Pale Guard. They have some tents that haven't been used for a while, you take those with you. Supplies are given. You head to Syngorn. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's cocked if I've ever seen cocked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good. That's a good one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Investigation. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Within a short time, as the evening draws in, it's not a full moon, but it's still a very big moonlit night and you find in Syngorn one of the larger temples to the Moonweaver, there's a night guide there named Nusem, and it's the temple of the Pale Light. And so, as you approach him and give your request, he's like, "A jug of our blessed water, that is an unusual request. We take "no money, but offerings in trade of equal value as you honestly see fit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Well, I don't have very much on my person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever you feel would be a viable trade within the eyes of the Moonweaver herself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I know about the Moonweaver?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a religion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Imma roll my moonstone dice for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What am I rolling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Religion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A religion, jeez. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. You know that she is the goddess of the moon, the night, and of autumn. She is known as-- she doesn't fall on the good or bad spectrum, she's generally a bit of a trickster, but however tends to be used or at least called to by young love to bless trysts to not be discovered. That's kind of the gist of what you can pick up on that roll, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like she would appreciate this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes a moment, looks at it. "I think the goddess will be pleased." And he puts it in his robes and he takes the blessed water and hands it to you. It's a small, pretty heavy-- especially when it's filled-- clay pot that is sealed at the top with multiple rounds of rope and some sort of a dark black tar-like substance that seems to seal the top and he passes it over to you and you take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't think this part through. Thank you very much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Strength of seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm just a little bit stronger. Not quite as bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you gather that, you find your way back without issue. We'll say without issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, I'm just gonna pass it over to Trinket and make him hold it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you attach it to Trinket's armor on the top. Easy enough. So you guys eventually make your way back to the town. You guys find an evening of rest, you complete, restore your spells, you, sulfur, go ahead and make a tinkering check. This is intelligence modifier and proficiency bonus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay. For you, 'cause most of the sulfur that you have currently has already been put in with the salpeter and other means of creating the gunpowder, so you have to reverse-engineer a lot of it. It's not going to be pure, what you have, or at least not all of it. I mean, you have some pure sulfur still, but to get the full half-pound of it, it's gonna be a little dirty. But you manage to get it to happen. And Vax is providing the lavender. Okay. All righty. And the diamond, who's giving the diamond? Or do you have one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a diamond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much is it worth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got multiple diamonds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, choose a diamond.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll choose one that's worth-- in my bag of gems-- no, that's not right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "In my-- nah. Right here in my-- nope."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, fine, I've got two diamonds, both worth 1,500. I don't have a thousand-gold diamond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That'll suffice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but it's a waste. It's okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a waste of 500.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Pike. It's worth it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This will suffice. Whenever you're ready, let's "make our way to wherever you find is necessary to do this ritual."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you'll be quite pleased.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep an eye on those goods, brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Trickfoots. Trickfoots? Trickfoots!" They're all right around him, and he's like, "Hello? Anyone?" Johann reaches out and touches his shoulder. "Ah! Yes, there you are. Come, we "have an exorcism." And so they follow you as you grab your materials. How are you doing this? You're doing multiple trips?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was tree-striding us all to the base of the mountain, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope, you were gonna gas us all the way there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I'm doing? Okay. Double-gas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a gas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Early morning, with the Wind Walk, you can get ten creatures, which is you seven, plus-- you put Trinket in your necklace-- Doty, which is eight, and you can take two of the gnomes if you'd like, or would you prefer to leave with the four of them and them come back for them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say, let's get all of the gnomes up there first so they can begin setting everything up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'll stay behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll stay behind as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm gonna take Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy can stay, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll stay as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh, gross.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm making a trip back. I'm gonna take Tary, Pike, the gnomes, Vax, me, how many's left? That's it, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take Doty so he can set up the tents.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you can take everyone except for me and Percy, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that should work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, please, I wanna go with Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Grog will go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys go ahead, and utilizing the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't you guys start off on the rug?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you know what, you can tree-stride us through, and then you guys head up and then we'll just meet you up there on the broom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll tree-stride some through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just me and Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, easy enough to do. You've seen these woods, or the perimeter of the woods, at least, so you know vaguely a tree in the direction that Percy points you towards. So with that, you touch the edge of the Sun Tree, the exterior of it opens into a doorway, and through that-- (laughs) The trust-fall that is Percival and Vex rushing through the Sun Tree before it closes behind. You trust that they are at the destination required and will meet you there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll meet you there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It closes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lock the door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you watch as the smaller gnome mists also kind of appear and some of them start swirling around excitedly, and one of them just seems to drift.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh no. Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you guys start making your way--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's sleeping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (snoring)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Following towards the path which Percival pointed you guys. So. This is about a six-plus-hour journey as you're coasting over the entirety of the Parchwood Forest. And it is beautiful, it's actually not too cloudy today. You've come past Winter's Crest, it's been a few weeks since.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sings) Butterfly in the sky.

lines.name: MARISHA, ASHLEY, MATT
lines.text: (sing) I can fly twice as high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After quite some time, and having to maybe go back a few times to keep everyone together as you have four people who have never done this before who are just awed by this, you lead them towards the northeast very, very top of the Salted Bluffs of the Alabaster Sierras, and you begin to see what Percival described to you, which is a shelf-like bluff at the very top, where you see a few clusters of rock and one large rock archway that comes up right to the cliff before it drops down into the sea to the north. And this is where these offerings were left. Eventually you guys make your way there, and given the speed, you still get there before Vax and Percy do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex and Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry. Vex and Percy. Five years of this, and let this be a lesson for when you name your characters for your campaign. As you guys approach, you all condense back into your mist form, except for the four other clouds that are all circling and circling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't know how to break it, do they? Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually one of them kind of congeals and turns back and it's JB.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would've told them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thousands and thousands and thousands of feet to rocks and ocean.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right on the edge, looking down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there's a large stone archway there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you wearing your armor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am, yeah. We left, we packed up. Some thoughts I just have inside my head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are me and Percy there yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet, you guys are just making your way there. You do notice, the rock archway looks both ancient and very well-constructed, and it's impressive that even though the erosion and the nature of the strong, cliffside winds that come up there, it's kept as well as it has. You also see a number of long-rotted baskets and sacks and dried, decomposing fruits and fish bones. You can see where basically the remnants of different offerings were left up here as part of the Pelor blessing to the fishermen that walk through the Salted Bluffs. Eventually, Vex and Percival make their way up here as well, and you guys are now, full journey, about midafternoon, with three days until the full moon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three days to kill.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey. That cliff's really high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, time to pitch a tent and make it fabulous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's not do the ritual site right next to that cliff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a great idea. Is there a way to move it sort of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- inward?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move back a bit, yeah. The bluff itself is maybe about 70 feet from one side to the other. It's flat. So you can move it further back towards this edge of the cliff, as opposed to being the one that's seaside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you guys want to accomplish in the three days in particular?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think the twins will probably look around and make sure that nobody has been here recently other than us, or see if there's anything hinky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we do that. Definitely. 23.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you look through the chunks and pieces, you see bits of dried leather, flesh, and with that in mind, over the next two days, you begin to see, way off in the north, what appear to be a number of flying entities that group in clusters that kind of exist over the cliffside, down along the actual mountain edge, and occasionally have apparently made distant nests and are still maneuvering in the distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see the type of feather it is? Can I tell what kind of creature it was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using the combination of your broom and your ranger-like vision, you've encountered these creatures once before, at the Salted Bluff, but avoided them. There are small clusters of harpies that make their home here on the cliffsides by the ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they took all our horses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This will be your stealth check for the camp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't cast Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not on your camp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, probably not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, rogue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say, for the purposes of that, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What am I rolling? What am I adding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But would I have used my-- what is that shit? Hide in Plain Sight? Could I have used that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But two days go by, harpies don't seem to pay mind. There's a couple of close calls where a couple fly overhead, but you all see them coming and get low and tell the gnomes to go inside, and get behind the rocks, and they seem to pass without actually noticing your presence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "The time is nigh. We must prepare the ritual." And, for the purposes of this, can we bring in the battlemap that is on this side?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Battlemap? Just call it a map, Matt, don't call it a battlemap!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This side, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Battlemap over there? That means there's another one over there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are several options, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Here it comes. Here comes the battlemap. Here it comes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, what is this? There's color changes happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like the birthday cake coming out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impressed noises)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is extra.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's weird, the blue light makes it almost-- I can't even see what it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's hard to see with the blue light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it really? That's a problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay, we'll figure it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could be this monitor. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Here are the gnomes, clustered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, in preparation for this ritual, I would like to cast-- can Doty use an item that I cast magic into?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty cannot, I believe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, then I'll cast Revivify into one of my coins and give it to Vex and say, use this on me if I fall. Oh, and also, I'll give her my five Needle Arrows that I made.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are these?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're just regular arrows that have a +1 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Badass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So just a little extra accuracy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, you just keep surprising me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're worth it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With Ogden saying they're ready, can I just be alone in the tent for a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. And actually, this is a point as well, because part of this was supposed to be hallowed ground, which requires the Hallow spell, which is a 24-hour casting period.
