lines.text: It's a dexterity save. 15

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a no. That is a no-no-no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a natural four to an addled old man. All right, so roll 5d4 force damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you throw the bead down, it bursts in a flash of energy and light, and you watch as Ogden's staff just gets fucking thrown 25 feet in the air from the blast. He's like (yells). He falls on his side and gets back up, and you see him now encased in this sphere of force. Immediately this smoke creature vanishes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll say, Doty! Carry him to the edge of the cliff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can Doty-- I don't think Doty can move the sphere, can he?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sphere weighs one pound, regardless of what is inside of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? That's fucking amazing. Are you serious?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gently!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How big can the sphere get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's ten by ten. I mean, encircled--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a hamster ball.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (groans) I'm so mad!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can carry him to the cliff!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it was just to steal a thousand-gold diamond. Maybe it was just to steal the diamond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just like-- at this point, he goes, "You killed it! That's amazing! Pike is saved!" The sphere gets picked up. "Wait! Huh?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pick JB up by her wrist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, she's just starting to dart off and you grab her by the wrist. Go ahead and make a grapple check. Make an athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Athletics, huh? Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? You go to grab for her wrist, and as you grab she wrenches out of it and goes darting this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm blasting off after her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And can I do an Entangle spell around her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC, or the save on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I haven't done an Entangle in a second-- give me a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have it right here. It is a strength check against your spell DC.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beat a 20, bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna Grasping Vine JB as she starts to run off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it! Do it! Do it! Ranger!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gets some distance. What's the Grasping Vine--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Ogden the one in the sphere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spell save 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, dexterity. Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You put the Grasping Vine out and she just-- (heavy breathing).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, forget this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait-wait! I already said I'm winged and Hasted, I'm already there! She can't go anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, all right. So as you aim, you watch as a raven swoops down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep watching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Matt is so fucking good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty is now carrying this sphere and walking towards the edge over here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take her 100 feet up and give her a good view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, she's breathing super, super fast. And at this point you see, as he's walking over to the edge, Ogden's like, "You-- Look! You saved everyone! Good job!" (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's committed to this bit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't overcommit! Don't overcommit! No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you rush over towards him, as Doty's got him maybe ten feet from the edge and now you can see as he's like, "Oh! Pike?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, Doty's not finished walking yet. Doty, keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pike, Pike. We have-- You have been saved from the darkness of a family line of terrible curses."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dicks! Motherfuckers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pike, Pike, Pike, Pike, what would Sarenrae "think? What would Sarenrae think?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's so lively all of a sudden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's been crotchety and immobile this whole time, and now you watch him up against the glass and he's standing up straight, and he's like, "Pike, "Pike, seriously, it's fine. It's fine. What would Sarenrae think?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna walk below the cliff and just stand on the cliff and start knocking on the ball on the other side and waving so he can get a nice view of the drop down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. No-no-no! Seriously, it's fine. We're family."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ogden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's the diamond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I-- it was used in the spell!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, it wasn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The spell that we used to summon the creature."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's-- Ogden. That was bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: God damn it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does his fear grant advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you have advantage, given this circumstance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Given this circumstance, you definitely have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, (sighs), and holds the diamond out in front.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is he still in the ball?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's still in the ball.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Push him out further.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, just hold him over the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can have the diamond back! It's just--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the play here? What's the game? What were you trying to get? Not that diamond. There's more to it than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We hear of all the great deeds you've done. All the dragons you've killed. All the vast amounts of money and gold you've procured the past couple years of your adventures. And we get sent a measly sum! A small hint of nothing but a paltry pinch."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She didn't have to send you anything, you dick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She didn't! And yet, we came to offer you nothing but a fantastical story of redemption and "the healing of a family, and you got to know your cousin who you've not spoken to since you left."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I trusted you. I put myself out there and I trusted you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he goes (screams) and just plummets off the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was technically right below it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna make a grab.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was kind of prepared for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex saving throw? You know. I'm going to re-roll that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? You can just do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use a Resolve. Yeah. It's the exact same roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex saving roll-- it's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whiff) (screams)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, in that second I can go 500 feet in six seconds, so can I blast down towards the cliff and dump her ten feet and keep going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's going to be the most gnarly drop-off ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not safely?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Safely?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's gonna break some legs. it's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Safely? Safely? I will go (whoosh) and let her take a little damage and hit the bottom. You know, I'm not gonna--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you dropping her? You're over here right now, you picked her up and went over this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can go like (plane sounds). I'll take a little turn up and let her-- she can take some damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can take some damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or we could let the dude die, but I'm already doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She tumbles. Stops about five feet from the edge. She's still hyperventilating.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got 400 more feet to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just tumbling down as he falls faster towards the cliff rocks and you can just barely see the waves crashing from the moonlight that's hitting him as you're just in a full-on raven dive towards it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bullet train, baby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh God!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take her and Grasping Vine and throw her into my entanglement and just keep all of them entangled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grasping Vine is a concentration spell, you'll lose the entanglement if you do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay. I'm going to use the Rope of Entanglement that I have and use it on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, without even really much of a resistance from her, she's tangled up in the rope, and falls on the ground on her side. Go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Saving throw? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, for this in particular, because it's less of a reaction, this is a-- make a dexterity check. This is just a plus your dexterity bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach out once and grab a section of the cloth and it tears-- and he keeps plummeting. You watch as the stones below-- it's a jagged base of the Salted Bluffs. About ten feet before impact, as his screaming has stopped-- and you grab him and just (whff) right across the surface of the water, but inches! His toes-- the tips of his feet skid across the surface of the water as you (whoosh) and rocket him straight back up towards the top of the cliff. It's going to take you a little while to get up there now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Diving is one thing. He is unconscious in your grasp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the Haste is gone by the time I've gone through all that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you're slowly flying your way back up. You guys are bent over and you can see the raven wings-- you can't quite see whether or not he got him, but all you see is Vax slowly making his way back towards the top of the cliff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should we tell them if he survived? Or do you want to surprise them? I say loudly enough for everybody to hear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Surprise them!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about you tell us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pulling back up. Oh yeah, he's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to walk over to JB. She's tangled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's wrapped up in the rope and she's like (breathing heavily).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to slowly start untangling her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi, Pike."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi, JB. For starters--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry. I'm sorry."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And if anything, I hope you learn from this. What do you want? What do you want from me? Tell me and I'll give it to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't care about the money, that's what they wanted. Honestly, I just used this as an "excuse to get to see you again. It would have been fine if no one had found out anything. We would "have been heroes. We would have had no reason to not be friends again. We would have saved you, as "far as you know, from a terrible curse, and maybe that would have-- maybe then I would have been a "hero to you. But I'm nothing. I'm a caretaker to a swindler and move around too much to make any real "friends, so that's just my lot in life, I guess."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It doesn't have to be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all I know."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But you're very smart. I think there's more for you in this life than you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see now, she's just tears now, at this point.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to walk over to Johann and Astra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We were under the impression that there was a "terrible curse."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: "Money?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! No! We-- Look. Look! Okay. Look, we have been following--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tighten the grasp on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We would have gone our own way. But maybe stayed "for a week! Made you dinner. But here we are. Are we bad? Are we evil? I don't think so. But that's "up to you, Miss Priest." At this point, Astra's like, "Shh. Honey, honey! Just calm down." And he's like, "No! No-no-no-no. No. Okay. She can think she's better than us, that's fine. You want "to fight the Trickfoot name, that's great. You're still a Trick--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go, and down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Astra goes, "You did kind of drop a mace on my toe."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I know. That was on purpose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I gathered as much."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! I'm so mad!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't rush it. Don't rush it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's Ogden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait another few minutes. It's a long flight up at this point without the Haste. I mean, the winds do help a little bit, because the winds are hitting the cliff and heading upwards. So the updraft does help a bit, but it takes about five or six minutes or so for him to eventually get his way back up to the top. Probably longer than that, even. Then eventually you watch as Vax returns and drops an unconscious, unmoving Ogden onto the rocky cliffside floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Old bugger looks so sweet when he's sleeping.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does he still have the diamond with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Funny thing. When that orb disappeared, and he fell, so did him and the diamond.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Windmill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he is not with the diamond. The diamond is nowhere to be seen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That'll make someone's day, eventually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was more the principle of the matter.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I'm sad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike? If you send them on their way, think about JB. That's all I ask.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Ogden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's unconscious.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't one of you people have the touch?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go over and backhand his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've, uh--" His glasses are gone. His eyes that were once beady are now wide and he's like, "Oh. Hi, Pike."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Listen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gotcha!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Okay. So this wrecked me. So here's what we're going to do. I'm going to send you guys on your way. I'm going to take out my purse of money. I'm giving you all my money. Stop. Don't say anything. I want you, and I want Astra, and I want Johann to leave and I never want to see you again. JB is going to stay here with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances over at JB, who's, right now-- head is down, just looking at the ground. You can see a little bit of moonlight that's coming by, you can see the wet streaks on her cheeks. He goes "That's very, very fair. That's very kind, and very fair."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to teach her things. I will put her through school. And her and I together will change the Trickfoot name. But if I ever see any of you again, I will fucking kill you all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. Sorry. And how do we get back?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll find your way. I pat them all down and make sure they didn't steal anything from us on the way out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an investigation check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wish I remembered my number. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Okay. I mean, they're all pretty prostrate at this point. Feeling through Ogden and Astra and Johann, you find about 400 gold worth of silverware. Various other coins.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bastards!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find some random odds and ends from the castle that have all been pocketed and hidden in boots. Hidden in hidden pockets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it with people and our fucking silverware? You can take the money! You can't have the items! These all have very sentimental value, including those fucking dresses you destroyed. You little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And as a bonus, there is a diamond at the bottom of the cliff, if you're feeling nimble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I release my spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Entanglement drops. Gets up. "Okay, well. I guess we have a long journey ahead of us, "isn't that right, Dad?" And Uncle Ogden is now standing without the hunch and is like, "I believe "so. I think we have quite the journey ahead of us."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not killing anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sinaeth, Grog. Sinaeth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where did Ogden's staff go when it got jettisoned out of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about, maybe, 25 feet this way. It clattered against the rocks here and fell to the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go gather it real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you go and grab it. It's the same gnarled wood still--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Detect Magic on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I don't have that. I have Dispel Magic. Hey, Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi! What do you want?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this look like anything to you? Does this look magical? Can you tell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will Identify it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It is a Staff of Major Image.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! That seems useful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here you go, Tary!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! Thank you! This will help make up for the 3500 gold I spent on this fight! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk up to Ogden. Give a little-- When you make it down the hill, you will find your cart outside the city limits in perfect working order, searched for anything else you might have tried to stash away from my city. I'd also like to remind you that the Riflemen have seen your faces up close, and the next time you come anywhere near our castle, you will be shot on sight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Read loud and clear, Percival."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I release a low charge of Diplomacy right into him. Just so we're clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (panting) "Crystal."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come! We're leaving!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and Johann!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Johann's like, "Uh, yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stay away from those sweets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So watch out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There it is!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, the rest of the Trickfoot family begins to make their long, meandering way down the mountainside, leaving you guys there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Assholes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they were so tore up to hand over JB! It was like Les Mis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! They didn't even give a shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "What to do? What to say? Can you carry our treasure away?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was-- After the last game I was like, I feel so bad I treated them so badly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt is so good! You played us! Every time! We're so stupid! He was rolling every time-- "Oh, "he missed again! Oh! Wow, this guy can't roll real good, can he?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you fucking son of a bitch! You son of a bitch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were so stupid!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Oh, he missed you with advantage? Yeah! He misses you! What's his AC? 12? He misses you!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting note, all of the attacks that didn't affect him were all the attacks that Ogden couldn't see happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were you even writing down damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was! 'Cause I wanted to make it look realistic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my God, this guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a liar!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much damage did we do to your little fucking marionette?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I wrote down numbers!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure Critrolestats has a number of damage that was dealt to the air.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were just doing the John Stewart bullshit, like "Ah. Ah!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wrote them all down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm like, this motherfucker has more hit points than a fucking dragon. What the shit is going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we healing it? What the hell?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Good investigate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I could totally see you doing that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow! That I could totally see playing out. I completely believe that you would do that, you son-of-a-bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I-- How am I getting a "son-of-a-bitch"? He's the son-of-a-bitch! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, guys, have a wonderful night. Rest well, tomorrow's another day. Pick up, move on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We all have work early, so we're in the same boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
